trans-unit.source: Specifies the security settings for the <xref href="System.ServiceModel.WSDualHttpBinding"></xref>.
This class specifies the security settings for the `wsDualHttpBinding` binding.
Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.ServiceModel.WSDualHttpSecurity"></xref> class.
Gets the message-level security properties for the <xref href="System.ServiceModel.WSDualHttpBinding"></xref>.
The object returned specifies detailed message-level security properties for the `wsDualHttpBinding` binding.

The default values include: <xref:System.ServiceModel.MessageSecurityOverHttp.ClientCredentialType*> is <xref:System.ServiceModel.MessageCredentialType>, <xref:System.ServiceModel.MessageSecurityOverHttp.AlgorithmSuite*> is <xref:System.ServiceModel.Security.SecurityAlgorithmSuite.Basic256*>, and <xref:System.ServiceModel.MessageSecurityOverHttp.NegotiateServiceCredential*> is <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>.
Gets or sets the security mode for the parent <xref href="System.ServiceModel.WSDualHttpBinding"></xref>.
The value of this property determines whether message-level security is applied to the binding.
The value is not a valid <xref href="System.ServiceModel.WSDualHttpSecurityMode"></xref>.
Returns a value that indicates whether the <xref:System.ServiceModel.WSDualHttpSecurity.Message*> property has changed from its default value and should be serialized.
This is used by WCF for XAML integration.

<xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the <xref:System.ServiceModel.WSDualHttpSecurity.Message*> property value should be serialized; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
Returns a value that indicates whether the <xref:System.ServiceModel.WSDualHttpSecurity.Mode*> property has changed from its default value and should be serialized.
This is used by WCF for XAML integration.

<xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the <xref:System.ServiceModel.WSDualHttpSecurity.Mode*> property value should be serialized; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
